query.name: getUserByAccount
query.content: select * from im_user u where account=:account

query.name: getUserIdByAccount
query.content: select id from im_user where account=:account

query.name: getUserDataById
query.content: select u.id, u.number, u.account, u.email, u.mobile, u.signature, u.head, u.headType, u.nickname, u.name, u.spell, u.simpleSpell, u.gender, u.telephone, u.QQ, u.nation, u.birthdate, u.age, u.nativePlace, u.homeAddress, u.locationAddress, u.introduce, u.remark from im_user u where id=:id

query.name: queryUserList
query.content:
select u.id, u.number, u.account, u.email, u.mobile, u.signature, u.head, u.headType, u.nickname, u.name, u.spell, u.simpleSpell, u.gender, u.telephone, u.QQ, u.nation, u.birthdate, u.age, u.nativePlace, u.homeAddress, u.locationAddress, u.introduce, u.remark from im_user u where 1=1
<#if queryText?? && ''!=queryText> and ( u.account like :queryText or u.nickname like :queryText ) </#if>
<#if name?? && ''!=name> and u.name like :name </#if>
<#if account?? && ''!=account> and u.account = :account </#if>
<#if nickname?? && ''!=nickname> and u.nickname like :nickname </#if>
<#if age?? && ''!=age> and u.age = :age </#if>
<#if constellation?? && ''!=constellation> and u.constellation = :constellation </#if>
<#if blood?? && ''!=blood> and u.blood = :blood </#if>
<#if startBirthdate?? && ''!=startBirthdate> and u.birthdate >= :startBirthdate </#if>
<#if endBirthdate?? && ''!=endBirthdate> and u.birthdate <= :endBirthdate </#if>
<#if gender?? && ''!=gender> and u.gender = :gender </#if>
order by id

query.name: getUserCategoryMemberUserDataList
query.content: select u.id, u.number, u.account, u.email, u.mobile, u.signature, u.head, u.headType, u.nickname, u.name, u.spell, u.simpleSpell, u.gender, u.telephone, u.QQ, u.nation, u.birthdate, u.age, u.nativePlace, u.homeAddress, u.locationAddress, u.introduce, u.remark from im_user u where 1=1 and exists ( select ucm.memberUserId from im_user_category_member ucm where ucm.memberUserId=u.id and ucm.ownUserId=:userId )

query.name: getGroupMemberUserDataListByGroupId
query.content: select u.id, u.number, u.account, u.email, u.mobile, u.signature, u.head, u.headType, u.nickname, u.name, u.spell, u.simpleSpell, u.gender, u.telephone, u.QQ, u.nation, u.birthdate, u.age, u.nativePlace, u.homeAddress, u.locationAddress, u.introduce, u.remark from im_user u where 1=1 and exists ( select gm.userId from im_group_member gm where gm.userId=u.id and gm.groupId =:groupId )

query.name: getGroupMemberUserDataListByUserId
query.content: select u.id, u.number, u.account, u.email, u.mobile, u.signature, u.head, u.headType, u.nickname, u.name, u.spell, u.simpleSpell, u.gender, u.telephone, u.QQ, u.nation, u.birthdate, u.age, u.nativePlace, u.homeAddress, u.locationAddress, u.introduce, u.remark from im_user u where 1=1 and exists ( select gm.userId from im_group_member gm where gm.userId=u.id and gm.groupId in ( select gcm.groupId from im_group_category_member gcm where gcm.userId=:userId ) )
